title: Need help for my rune page
body:
I'm not really interested in changing my playstyle to fit the most OP rune page, I'd much rather have a suboptimal rune page to match my playstyle, so beware if you see things that make no sense from a optimizer's perspective.

I really want AP glyphs for the extra aggressive early poke on champions like

{{champion:101}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:99}} 

I take scaling because I can get away with a bit less at first, but I plan on getting a second rune page for flat AP if I ever need it

so I don't take MR glyphs. Most champs who can get into {{champion:101}} range are gap closers who deal physical damage, so is taking armour seals instead of MR seals perfectly fine for mid, even though most mid champs are magic damage, or should I try to fit them somewhere else? I'd be willing to mix and match some MR if it's really required.

My quintessences are always flat AP, but the MS quintessences look really nice, and I tend to stack MS for fun. I might change in the future

My marks are always flat MPen, non-percentage MPen is a REALLY rare stat, and I rarely auto attack later in game. Full MPen marks usually leaves me with half a Liandry's worth of MPen. ArPen doesn't seem as useful as flat AD if I really need it as I barely do any damage with AA anyway.

My seals are currently being worked on and are flat mana regen. I kinda want to keep mana regen but I _know_ I need armour when I get to ranked. It works perfectly in normal mode though, it gives me the sustain I need to spam pokes and get the enemy laner to recall early.

What should I change to get my runes to barely scrape the line for _viable_, while not radically changing it too much? It works perfectly fine for me right now but I want to see what changes I can make.

replies.body:
Im assuming this is for ranked. I have two rune pages one against ad and one for ap.

Against AD:
Quints: Flat AP
marks: Flat Magic Pen
Seals: Flat armour
Glyphs: scaling Cooldown reduction (you want this because it gives you 15% at 18 and with 5% in masteries you have capped cdr with morello)

Against AP:
quints: Flat AP
Marks: Flat magic Pen
Seals: scaling hp
glyphs: scaling cooldown reduction
